siteMetadata.title: Blog by Dani Akash
siteMetadata.subtitle: I love Science & Technology. I work as a software engineer and specialize in building mobile apps with Javascript. I travel a lot, study science and nature of the Universe and I'm always ready for a nice conversation on Particle Physics.

frontmatter.title: Upgraded to Gatsby v2
frontmatter.description: This starter has been forked and upgraded to Gatsby v2

frontmatter.title: Johannes Gutenberg: The Birth of Movable Type
frontmatter.description: German inventor Johannes Gutenberg developed a method of movable type and used it to create one of the western world’s first major printed books, the “Forty–Two–Line” Bible.
